instruction: Given a restaurant menu, suggest an affordable dish.
input:
Chef's Specials
• Grilled Ribeye Steak - $21.95
• Herb-Roasted Chicken - $19.95
• Salmon with Citrus Sauce - $22.95
• Crispy Fried Calamari - $18.95
• Wild Mushroom Risotto - $19.95
output: The Crispy Fried Calamari is the most affordable dish at $18.95. It is lightly battered and fried, making it a satisfying and delicious meal.
